channel.title: Tokhaar kal help!
channel.description: Hey guys i've coded tokhar kal to spawn, than when we go to equip it is unable too? any help? revision - 507 base- vistex v7 problem- is not equiping tokhar kal ~ Sandons

item.title: Tokhaar kal help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

I’m guessing this is some type of new-Revision Equipment? You should include more details in your Server Help Thread. For example:

Revision #

The name of your Base

Your exact problem in specific detail

Anyway… There should be some place where your Equipment is defined inside of an Array or something of that effect, which determines the Equipment Slot the piece of Equipment will be assigned to. A good place to start looking would be your Java Classes with names such as “EquipmentWorn.Java”, “EquipAssign”, etc.

P.S. Someone will most likely be able to tell you exactly where the above is located if you include the name of the Base you’re using.

Read full topic
